[SYNTAX]: Abrupt transition between paragraphs (e.g., shift from Vereker to Bábí victims without clear connection)
[LEXICON]: Overly complex vocabulary may hinder smooth reading for some readers (e.g., "lucubrations", "infancy of art")
[GRAMMAR]: Minor punctuation inconsistencies (e.g., missing Oxford commas in some sentences)

[STRUCTURE]: Sudden, unexplained shift in topic (Bábí victims paragraph seems out of place)
[TRANSITION]: Lack of clear connections between some paragraphs (e.g., from Corvick's departure to the protagonist's night with Vereker)
[CLARITY]: Some sentences are overly long and convoluted, reducing clarity

[SYNTAX]: Abrupt transition between historical and conversational segments
[LEXICON]: Overly formal vocabulary may hinder smooth reading for some readers

[STRUCTURE]: Sudden, unconnected shift from dinner conversation to historical narrative
[CLARITY]: Unclear relevance of historical events to the preceding dialogue
